html: To tackle our nation's burden of debt, tough decisions and careful solutions are required. But the solutions must include reforms to save and sustain the mandatory programs serving many vulnerable Americans.

html: The federal government does not have a revenue problem, it has a mandatory spending problem. In 1965, mandatory accounted for 34% of the budget. Last year, it made up more than two-thirds. By 2028, that figure is projected to reach 77%.https://twitter.com/TomColeOK04/status/1108172968037924864 …
